pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extras and Extensions for 'xaringan' Slides // Extras and extensions for 'xaringan' slides. Navigate your slides with tile view. Make your slides editable, live! Announce slide changes with subtle tones. Animate slide transitions with 'animate.css'. Add tabbed panels to slides with 'panelset'. Use the 'Tachyons CSS' utility toolkit for rapid slide development. Scribble on your slides. Add a copy button to your code chunks with 'clipboard'. Add a logo or top or bottom banner to every slide. Broadcast slides to stay in sync with remote viewers. Include yourself in your slides with 'webcam'. Plus a whole lot more!
